title: (iMac) Significant FPS Drops in Nexus Siege Gamemode
body:
Hello,

Lately, I've been experiencing some pretty significant FPS drops while playing the game mode "Nexus Siege," but only in that game mode. Usually, I sit at around 60-120 FPS otherwise, while having all my video settings maxed out in game. However, joining a Nexus Siege match almost immediately causes my FPS to spike down to the 20s-30s in bursts. I tried lowering my graphics, but it did not resolve the issue.

Here are my specs:

> OS X El Capitan
> Version 10.11.5
> iMac (21.5-inch, Late 2013)
> Processor 2.9 GHz Intel Core i5
> Memory 8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3
> Graphics NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 1024 MB

Thanks for any help.

replies.body:
Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
Thanks, it seems like all I needed to do was repair the game files to resolve the issue!
Welcomed! Have fun on Sieging their Nexus!! :D

It sounds like your computer is having trouble rendering something in this game mode.  There may also be an issue with your game files that could require a repair.  I recommend going over our[ FPS Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide which Rineyy provided to help get this resolved.  Please be sure to select the red box labeled as Mac for steps specific to your OS!
Thanks! Repairing my game files solved the problem :)
It lags me pretty hard compared to other game modes, and I play on a Windows laptop. Suspect it's more of a general issue with the game mode than an issue with macs.
This mode also lags my relatively new MacBook Pro. No other game modes do so. Something on the Riot end probably.
same problem here! im using a mac air
same on macbook pro. on other game modes i get up to 160 + fps . on nexus siege it's mostly at 30 while going up to 120 when im at the base and no action is  happening on screen.

Pretty sure [this step](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) solve your issue for the most part however if you've already performed it and it hasn't helped; 

Drop a line with Riot’s [Technical Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)


* The primary category has already been chosen. 


* For the secondary category, select **My FPS keeps dropping in-game**

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HCCc9VGLMBs/VvGim_HT2MI/AAAAAAAA5EU/CQi6aIgFrm0rtxw5hZl4Al3mMP3k3JAyg/s1600/Lissandra_Splash_3.jpg



[Need help obtaining logs? Soraka will be your aide! ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)


https://static2.lolwallpapers.net/2016/04/57010692ced3c.jpg
